inclusion.criterion: carotid artery severe (70-99%) stenosis or occlusion
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: color duplex flow imaging, confirmed by CT angiography

inclusion.criterion: indications for carotid artery stenting or CEA according to guidelines
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Stroke Prevention Engineering Committee, National Health Commission of China

inclusion.criterion: MRI and CT applicated pre- and postoperation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: non-atherosclerotic carotid artery stenosis or occlusion
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: lack of any imaging evaluation results
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has carotid artery severe stenosis diagnosed by color duplex flow imaging and confirmed by CT angiography. He meets the indications for carotid artery stenting or CEA according to guidelines.
